struct.exostring:
// SCRIPTED // the first time the player talks to rahasia
Dialog Mission Statement These dialogs are the conversations the player canhave with Rahasia inside the Sandral estate.
The first dialog is when the player first meets Rahasia, either after having talked to Nurik, or having gone in the back door and found her in her room. The second dialog is if the player has offended Rahasia in a previous conversation. The third dialog is if the player has talked to Shen and been told he won't leave without her. The fourth dialog is for conversations after Rahasia has asked the player to free Shen, but before learning that he won't leave without her.
Exit points inconversation:
Exit stream 1: When this conversation start DAN_MEET_DONE is set to TRUE to show that the player has met Rahasia. The player can either be nice, or be mean. If nice, DAN_ROMANCE_PLOT is set to 2 to show that Rahasia has asked the player to help. There is a possibility of a minor dark side hit if the player is rude, and it exits to stream 4. If the player is mean, DAN_HATE_DONE is set to TRUE to show that Rahasia hates the player. There are possibilities for a minor or a medium dark side hit in this path for being uncaring. Party members interject comments and the stream ends.
Exit stream 2: The player can either apologize (and get a minor light side bonus) and have DAN_HATE_DONE set to FALSE, or be insensitive and take another minor dark side hit. NOTE: there is the possibility of infinite dark side hits if the player keeps going on like this. If the player apologizes, this stream exits to stream 1, otherwise the conversation ends.
Exit stream 3: DAN_LEAVE_DONE is set to TRUE to show that Rahasia has agreed to leave with Shen and the conversation ends.
Exit stream 4: The lines are said and the conversation ends. If the character has not previously been given the key to the door (or found it), Rahasia gives the player the key.
// DIALOGUE // subsequent time the player talsk to rahasia
// SCRIPTED // upon entering the sandral estate by the front door and having informed the droid you wish to tell nurik about his son

// SCRIPTED // upon entering the sandral estate by the front and having informed the droid you wish to speak with nurik
Dialog Mission Statement These dialogs are for Nurik Sandral in the main hall of his estate. The player can talk to him about Shen, or about his son. Both dialog are exactly the same except for the opening line which is determined by the means with which the player entered the estate. If the player tries to question him about Shen, he tells them to leave, then exits through a door and is removed from the module. If the player mentions his son Casus, he asks for his son's diary. If it is provided, he gives the player money.
Exit points in conversation:
Exit stream 1: The player can ask about Shen, but Nurik tells them to leave (with a comment by Canderous if present). He can mention that he found the body of Casus. DAN_PLOT_CASUS is set to 3 to show that the plot has been completed. If the player is very insensitive towards Nurk about his son he takes a minor dark side hit. The Casus stream ends with either Nurik giving the player money for the diary, or asking them to find it and ending (with comments by party members for some).
Exit stream 2: This conversation links to stream 1.
// gain 200 credits if player has the diary
// DIALOGUE // subsequent time the player talsk to rahasia
